entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Whale Cove
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:17 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -35.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Whale Cove Airport 02:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: -35.9°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Humidity: 69 %

Dewpoint: -39.6°C
Wind: WNW 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Clear. Blowing snow this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 58 this evening and minus 53 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 35.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 35. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 53 in the evening and minus 59 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
